name: Heartless (Tom Jongens)
description:
Heartless is a spaceship shooter where you are hunted. Slash through your hunters and fuel your engine for powers. Your survival requires agility and a cunning use of your abilities.  The demon underneath the surface watches you with increasing interest.

*Game works best with a controller*

***

Gameplay explanation:

Your base attack is dashing. By dashing through enemies you absorb their powers. Upon activation you have up to 4 different kind of attacks.

Purple: Large bullet, high damage, 3 phases
Pink: Small bullet, low damage, high velocity and rate of fire
Cyaan: Normal damage, steals health
Yellow: Melee attack, wide area, short range

Includes:

  • Items to unlock and pickup during play
  • Different enemies with different attacks
  • Seven stages
  • Boss fight
  • Keyboard and controller support

Happy to receive feedback!
